item.title: Consulting
item.description: Consulting Services We offer consultation services for the following: Website building (management, coding, hosting, telemetry, https, etc.) PowerShell, C#, Java, TypeScript Basic Tableau Contact us for more information Image Credits: Unsplash: Pen on a notebook image by @faceline Site Views: 0 Page Views: 0 Your Site Views: 0 Your Page Views: 0

item.title: New Jam Stack
item.description: Previous version of brewingcats.com was built on a different JAM Stack , in particular a different Static Site Generator . Building brewingcats.com on Gatsby on Gatsby brought us a lot of experience and allowed us to make use of our knowledge in React and apply it to the website. React is core to the structure of the site, we also had the opportunity of learning GraphQL querying system to perform basic operations

item.title: First Post
item.description: This first post is written in Markdown. 😄 List of features to evaluate here: ✅ Insertion of custom JavaScript this includes: ✅ Tableau embedded vizzes (use partials) ✅ Embedding Instagram ( built-in shortcode ) ✅ Embedding Airplay Boards (use partials) ✅ My own customized telemetry ( frontmatter library ) ✅ Google Ads (via partials ) ✅ Disqus commenting (via partials) ✅ Share This social buttons (use partials) ✅ Google Analytics (via partials) ✅ Embedding Giphy (via partials) ✅ Multi-language support Contents:
